readable.title: 2540884723_03d60ef548
readable.content: A man and woman are sitting on concrete stairs . A man and woman sit on cement stairs outside of a store . A woman in a red business suit sits on a step sharing food with a man in a leather jacket . a woman wearing a pink jacket sitting on a staircase with a man wearing a grey hat sitting a few steps behind . The woman wearing the pink blazer is talking to the man wearing the golf cap .
